DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 120 female volunteers requesting a pregnancy test will be recruited locally to the UK trial centre. Volunteers will be required to use the Clearblue Pregnancy Test according to the product instructions, and provide a urine sample from the same void. Trained technicians will conduct a second test from the urine sample.
DOC.brief_title: Clearblue Home Pregnancy Test Consumer Study
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 120 female volunteers attending the study site requesting a pregnancy test will be recruited locally to the UK trial centre. Volunteers will be required to use the Clearblue Pregnancy Test according to the product instructions, and provide a urine sample from the same void. Trained technicians will conduct a second test from the urine sample to evaluate performance between consumer and technician testing.
DOC.criteria: 1845 year old Female Requesting a pregnancy test
